title: Çilgin dersane 3 (2014)
overview: Özlem Dersanesi is staying in a hotel in Antalya in order to attend the national music contest for private prep schools.
storyline: 7 schools from 7 regions have qualified for the finals of the interschool Music Competition. However the Özlem and Imbat schools are favored to win the event. The final event is organized to take place at the same hotel in Antalya. Upon arriving at the property Ali a soloist from Özlem schools, who is well recognized for his powerful voice and covers , falls for a hotel employee named Zeynep. But it is going to be a challenge to capture the attention of Zeynep who is a quiet introvert. Things become tense between the schools during rehearsals as both parties resort to games and pranks to make life difficult for the other. But the real arguments begin once they discover that the hotel they are staying in is owned by Zeynep. The mother of Sebnem, a soloist for Imbat School, is also the stepmother of Zeynep. After the death of Zeyneps father the two duped her into turning over all rights to the property onto them and have essentially forced her to slave away in her own property. The gang...
synopsis: 7 schools from 7 regions have qualified for the finals of the interschool Music Competition. However the Özlem and Imbat schools are favored to win the event. The final event is organized to take place at the same hotel in Antalya. Upon arriving at the property Ali a soloist from Özlem schools, who is well recognized for his powerful voice and covers , falls for a hotel employee named Zeynep. But it is going to be a challenge to capture the attention of Zeynep who is a quiet introvert. Things become tense between the schools during rehearsals as both parties resort to games and pranks to make life difficult for the other. But the real arguments begin once they discover that the hotel they are staying in is owned by Zeynep. The mother of Sebnem, a soloist for Imbat School, is also the stepmother of Zeynep. After the death of Zeyneps father the two duped her into turning over all rights to the property onto them and have essentially forced her to slave away in her own property. The gang decides to both win the competition and bring an end to the game that is being played on Zeynep.
